cab.content: (Thig Document is the Property 0fHis Britannic Majesty^ Government)S E C RE T*From:'- Gen. Delme Radcliffe, Italy. To:- C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in:- 6.3 p.m. Received:- 7.3 p*m.15/11/17684 November 15th. Secret and Personal.Following from General Wilson for the information of the War Cabinet. Begins.. W.1Q6 Hovember 15th. This morning no real change. Pressure continues on Asiago plateau especially and the forward hill of the Grappa and enemy has gained ground slightly but not seriously. Zenson position seems better. General Foch continues his concentration north west of Vicenza and another 24 hours has passed in the meanwhile which is all to the good. Hessage ends.
